title: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy gets 2 new orders worth Rs 512 cr
description: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy Ltd has secured two new contracts worth Rs 512 crore. The company received orders for a 250 MWp DC project in Gujarat and a 65 MWp DC project in Maharashtra from private independent power producers. This highlights the confidence of existing clients in SWREL's capabilities.
